column5: I ended up with a St Croix baitcast rod. Somebody broke my spinning rod and replaced it with a baitcaster. It is a med light fast 6'6 1 pc premier. They tossed the tags so it is unreturnable. I figure I may as well make use of it. In the $80.00 range what reel could I put on this. I fish walleyes generally and some speckleds and lakers, and perch. Ideas?

The Shimano Citica is the reel that everyone was pointing me towards when I first was interested in baitcasting.  It's gear-ratio is perfect for spoons and crankbaits.  Your "target" species of fish are pretty spread out and the citica is a versatile reel.  Ryan
I like my daiwa strikeforce.  Cheap but very smooth.
Thanks guys. I ended up with an offer I couldn't refuse. trading it for a Mojo spinning. Gotta love OFC
